Package com.samskivert.depot.clause

Models the clauses of a SQL query: where, join, limit, etc.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryClause
    Represents a piece or modifier of an SQL query.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Distinct
    Represents a DISTINCT [ON <exp>] clause.
    FieldDefinition
    Supplies a definition for a computed field of the persistent object we're creating.
    FieldOverride
    Redirects one field of the persistent object we're creating from its default associated column to a general SQLExpression.
    ForUpdate
    Represents a FOR UPDATE clause.
    FromOverride
    Completely overrides the FROM clause, if it exists.
    GroupBy
    Represents a GROUP BY clause.
    InsertClause
    Builds actual SQL given a main persistent type and some QueryClause objects.
    Join
    Represents a JOIN.
    Limit
    Represents a LIMIT/OFFSET clause, for pagination.
    OrderBy
    Represents an ORDER BY clause.
    SelectClause
    Represents a complete select clause.
    Where
    Represents a where clause: the condition can be any comparison operator or logical combination thereof.
    WhereClause
    Currently only exists as a type without any functionality of its own.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Join.Type
    Indicates the join type to be used.
    OrderBy.Order
    Indicates the order of the clause.

Package com.samskivert.depot.clause Description

Models the clauses of a SQL query: where, join, limit, etc.
